page.title: 08POLITICS _ Parish Council
page.content: {THE PARISH COUNCIL { }There's been a Parish Council since 1890. There are six people. There is a chairman, Miss Lyon and a clerk whose name is Mrs.Dilly who lives in West End. The clerk is the person who people visit and complain about things. Then at the next meeting,the clerk talks about the things that people have complained about. About four of the people turn up at meetings normally. The Parish Council has quite a lot of power. It stretches from Essendon to the outskirts of Hatfield. One of the special projects they have got on at the moment,is keeping the village tidy. They would like to keep the village the way it is,in the future. They mainly work with the Essendon Society,if they work with other societies. People would like to see the conservation area enlarged.
